con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="loan.composite" name="Application" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:plink="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/05/partner-link/" xmlns:wsdlsoap11="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdlsoap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap11enc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:soap11env="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:soap12env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap12enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/03/addressing" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:tns="loan.composite"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="loan.composite" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xs:complexType name="getResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="request_id" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="getResultResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="getResultResult" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="submitRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="request_text" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="submitRequestResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="submitRequestResult" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="getResult" type="tns:getResult"/> <xs:element name="getResultResponse" type="tns:getResultResponse"/> <xs:element name="submitRequest" type="tns:submitRequest"/> <xs:element name="submitRequestResponse" type="tns:submitRequestResponse"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="submitRequest"> <wsdl:part name="submitRequest" element="tns:submitRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitRequestResponse"> <wsdl:part name="submitRequestResponse" element="tns:submitRequestResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getResult"> <wsdl:part name="getResult" element="tns:getResult"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getResultResponse"> <wsdl:part name="getResultResponse" element="tns:getResultResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:service name="LoanEvaluationComposite"> <wsdl:port name="Application" binding="tns:Application"> <wsdlsoap11:address location="http://127.0.0.1:8000/LoanEvaluationService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> <wsdl:portType name="Application"> <wsdl:operation name="submitRequest" parameterOrder="submitRequest"> <wsdl:documentation>Traite synchroniquement la demande entière et retourne la décision finale. - Crée request_id - Sauvegarde l'enregistrement initial (status=processing) - Appelle IE -> CC -> PE -> DS - Enregistre la décision, notifie, et retourne la décision + request_id</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="submitRequest" message="tns:submitRequest"/> <wsdl:output name="submitRequestResponse" message="tns:submitRequestResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getResult" parameterOrder="getResult"> <wsdl:documentation>Récupère l'enregistrement sauvegardé pour request_id (status + result).</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="getResult" message="tns:getResult"/> <wsdl:output name="getResultResponse" message="tns:getResultResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="Application" type="tns:Application"> <wsdlsoap11:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="submitRequest"> <wsdlsoap11:operation soapAction="submitRequest" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="submitRequest"> <wsdlsoap11:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="submitRequestResponse"> <wsdlsoap11:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getResult"> <wsdlsoap11:operation soapAction="getResult" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="getResult"> <wsdlsoap11:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getResultResponse"> <wsdlsoap11:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:loan="loan.composite">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <loan:submitRequest>\r <loan:request_text> Nom du Client: Jeanne Petit Adresse: 5 Rue des Fleurs, Paris Email: jeanne.petit@email.com Numéro de Téléphone: +33600111222 Montant du Prêt Demandé: 300000 Revenu Mensuel: 2000 Dépenses Mensuelles: 1500 Description de la Propriété: Petit appartement ancien, nécessite quelques travaux. </loan:request_text>\r </loan:submitRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
